Interface RouteInfoService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RouteInfoServiceImpl

    @Produces(value="application/json")
public interface RouteInfoService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAllRouteInfo()
      Get all RouteInfo XML in a GET request
      com.att.scld.grm.v1.GetRouteInfoResponse getRouteInfo(String requestBodyJSON)
      Get RouteInfo XML by providing a JSON format in a POST request Example: { "serviceVersionDefinition": { "name": "com.att.aft.TestService", "version": { "major": 1, "minor": 0, "patch": "0" } }, "env": "LAB" }

    • Method Detail

      • getRouteInfo

        @POST
 @Path(value="/get")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
com.att.scld.grm.v1.GetRouteInfoResponse getRouteInfo(String requestBodyJSON)
        Get RouteInfo XML by providing a JSON format in a POST request Example: { "serviceVersionDefinition": { "name": "com.att.aft.TestService", "version": { "major": 1, "minor": 0, "patch": "0" } }, "env": "LAB" }
        Parameters:
        JSON - of service version definition, and the env
        Returns:
        RouteInfo XML defined for the service

      • getAllRouteInfo

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getAll")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
String getAllRouteInfo()
        Get all RouteInfo XML in a GET request
        Parameters:
        No - input needed
        Returns:
        All RouteInfo XML defined
